00151 #if defined( _GPIO_PORT_G_PIN_COUNT ) && defined( _GPIO_PORT_H_PIN_COUNT )
00152 #define _GPIO_PORT_SIZE(port) (                \
00153         (port) == 0 ? _GPIO_PORT_A_PIN_COUNT : \
00154         (port) == 1 ? _GPIO_PORT_B_PIN_COUNT : \
00155         (port) == 2 ? _GPIO_PORT_C_PIN_COUNT : \
00156         (port) == 3 ? _GPIO_PORT_D_PIN_COUNT : \
00157         (port) == 4 ? _GPIO_PORT_E_PIN_COUNT : \
00158         (port) == 5 ? _GPIO_PORT_F_PIN_COUNT : \
00159         (port) == 6 ? _GPIO_PORT_G_PIN_COUNT : \
00160         (port) == 7 ? _GPIO_PORT_H_PIN_COUNT : \
00161         0)

00196 #define GPIO_PORT_VALID(port)          ( _GPIO_PORT_MASK(port) )
00197 #define GPIO_PORT_PIN_VALID(port, pin) ((( _GPIO_PORT_MASK(port)) >> (pin)) & 0x1 )

00212 typedef enum
00213 {
00214 #if ( _GPIO_PORT_A_PIN_COUNT > 0 )
00215   gpioPortA = 0,
00216 #endif
00217 #if ( _GPIO_PORT_B_PIN_COUNT > 0 )
00218   gpioPortB = 1,
00219 #endif
00220 #if ( _GPIO_PORT_C_PIN_COUNT > 0 )
00221   gpioPortC = 2,
00222 #endif
00223 #if ( _GPIO_PORT_D_PIN_COUNT > 0 )
00224   gpioPortD = 3,
00225 #endif
00226 #if ( _GPIO_PORT_E_PIN_COUNT > 0 )
00227   gpioPortE = 4,
00228 #endif
00229 #if ( _GPIO_PORT_F_PIN_COUNT > 0 )
00230   gpioPortF = 5
00231 #endif
00232 #if defined( _GPIO_PORT_G_PIN_COUNT ) && ( _GPIO_PORT_G_PIN_COUNT > 0 )
00233   gpioPortG = 6
00234 #endif
00235 #if defined( _GPIO_PORT_H_PIN_COUNT ) && ( _GPIO_PORT_H_PIN_COUNT > 0 )
00236   gpioPortH = 7
00237 #endif
00238 } GPIO_Port_TypeDef;

00329 /***************************************************************************/
00341 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_DbgSWDClkEnable(bool enable)
00342 {
00343 #if defined( _GPIO_ROUTE_SWCLKPEN_MASK )
00344   BUS_RegBitWrite(&(GPIO->ROUTE), _GPIO_ROUTE_SWCLKPEN_SHIFT, enable);
00345 #elif defined( _GPIO_ROUTEPEN_SWCLKTCKPEN_MASK )
00346   BUS_RegBitWrite(&(GPIO->ROUTEPEN), _GPIO_ROUTEPEN_SWCLKTCKPEN_SHIFT, enable);
00347 #else
00348 #warning "ROUTE enable for SWCLK pin is not defined."
00349 #endif
00350 }
00351 
00352 
00353 /***************************************************************************/
00365 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_DbgSWDIOEnable(bool enable)
00366 {
00367 #if defined( _GPIO_ROUTE_SWDIOPEN_MASK )
00368   BUS_RegBitWrite(&(GPIO->ROUTE), _GPIO_ROUTE_SWDIOPEN_SHIFT, enable);
00369 #elif defined( _GPIO_ROUTEPEN_SWDIOTMSPEN_MASK )
00370   BUS_RegBitWrite(&(GPIO->ROUTEPEN), _GPIO_ROUTEPEN_SWDIOTMSPEN_SHIFT, enable);
00371 #else
00372 #warning "ROUTE enable for SWDIO pin is not defined."
00373 #endif
00374 }

00392 {
00393 #if defined( _GPIO_ROUTE_SWOPEN_MASK )

00399 #endif
00400 }

00411 # if defined( _GPIO_EM4WUEN_MASK )
00412 /**************************************************************************/
00420 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_EM4DisablePinWakeup(uint32_t pinmask)
00421 {
00422   EFM_ASSERT((pinmask & ~_GPIO_EM4WUEN_MASK) == 0);
00423 
00424   GPIO->EM4WUEN &= ~pinmask;
00425 }
00426 #endif

00430 /**************************************************************************/
00438 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t GPIO_EM4GetPinWakeupCause(void)
00439 {
00440 #if defined( _GPIO_EM4WUCAUSE_MASK )
00441   return GPIO->EM4WUCAUSE & _GPIO_EM4WUCAUSE_MASK;
00442 #else
00443   return RMU->RSTCAUSE & _RMU_RSTCAUSE_EM4RST_MASK;
00444 #endif
00445 }

00449 #if defined( GPIO_CTRL_EM4RET ) || defined( _EMU_EM4CTRL_EM4IO0RETMODE_MASK )
00450 /**************************************************************************/
00459 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_EM4SetPinRetention(bool enable)
00460 {
00461   if (enable)
00462   {
00463 #if defined( GPIO_CTRL_EM4RET )
00464     GPIO->CTRL |= GPIO_CTRL_EM4RET;
00465 #else
00466     EMU->EM4CTRL = (EMU->EM4CTRL & ~_EMU_EM4CTRL_EM4IO0RETMODE_MASK)
00467                    | EMU_EM4CTRL_EM4IO0RETMODE_EM4EXIT;
00468 #endif
00469   }
00470   else
00471   {
00472 #if defined( GPIO_CTRL_EM4RET )
00473     GPIO->CTRL &= ~GPIO_CTRL_EM4RET;
00474 #else
00475     EMU->EM4CTRL = (EMU->EM4CTRL & ~_EMU_EM4CTRL_EM4IO0RETMODE_MASK)
00476                    | EMU_EM4CTRL_EM4IO0RETMODE_DISABLE;
00477 #endif
00478   }
00479 }
00480 #endif

00483 /***************************************************************************/
00499 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_InputSenseSet(uint32_t val, uint32_t mask)
00500 {
00501   GPIO->INSENSE = (GPIO->INSENSE & ~mask) | (val & mask);
00502 }

00512 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_IntClear(uint32_t flags)
00513 {
00514   GPIO->IFC = flags;
00515 }
00516 
00517 
00518 /***************************************************************************/
00525 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_IntDisable(uint32_t flags)
00526 {
00527   GPIO->IEN &= ~flags;
00528 }
00529 
00530 
00531 /***************************************************************************/
00543 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_IntEnable(uint32_t flags)
00544 {
00545   GPIO->IEN |= flags;
00546 }

00549 /***************************************************************************/
00556 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t GPIO_IntGet(void)
00557 {
00558   return(GPIO->IF);
00559 }
00560 
00561 
00562 /***************************************************************************/
00577 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t GPIO_IntGetEnabled(void)
00578 {
00579   uint32_t tmp;
00580 
00581   /* Store GPIO->IEN in temporary variable in order to define explicit order
00582    * of volatile accesses. */
00583   tmp = GPIO->IEN;
00584 
00585   /* Bitwise AND of pending and enabled interrupts */
00586   return GPIO->IF & tmp;
00587 }
00588

00599   GPIO->IFS = flags;
00600 }

00613 /***************************************************************************/
00626 __STATIC_INLINE unsigned int GPIO_PinInGet(GPIO_Port_TypeDef port,
00627                                            unsigned int pin)
00628 {
00629   EFM_ASSERT(GPIO_PORT_PIN_VALID(port, pin));
00630   return BUS_RegBitRead(&GPIO->P[port].DIN, pin);
00631 }
00632 
00633 
00634 /***************************************************************************/
00649 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_PinOutClear(GPIO_Port_TypeDef port, unsigned int pin)
00650 {
00651   EFM_ASSERT(GPIO_PORT_PIN_VALID(port, pin));
00652 #if defined( _GPIO_P_DOUTCLR_MASK )
00653   GPIO->P[port].DOUTCLR = 1 << pin;
00654 #else
00655   BUS_RegBitWrite(&GPIO->P[port].DOUT, pin, 0);
00656 #endif
00657 }
00658 
00659 
00660 /***************************************************************************/
00673 __STATIC_INLINE unsigned int GPIO_PinOutGet(GPIO_Port_TypeDef port,
00674                                             unsigned int pin)
00675 {
00676   EFM_ASSERT(GPIO_PORT_PIN_VALID(port, pin));
00677   return BUS_RegBitRead(&GPIO->P[port].DOUT, pin);
00678 }
00679 
00680 
00681 /***************************************************************************/
00696 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_PinOutSet(GPIO_Port_TypeDef port, unsigned int pin)
00697 {
00698   EFM_ASSERT(GPIO_PORT_PIN_VALID(port, pin));
00699 #if defined( _GPIO_P_DOUTSET_MASK )
00700   GPIO->P[port].DOUTSET = 1 << pin;
00701 #else
00702   BUS_RegBitWrite(&GPIO->P[port].DOUT, pin, 1);
00703 #endif
00704 }
00705 
00706 
00707 /***************************************************************************/
00722 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_PinOutToggle(GPIO_Port_TypeDef port, unsigned int pin)
00723 {
00724   EFM_ASSERT(GPIO_PORT_PIN_VALID(port, pin));
00725 
00726   GPIO->P[port].DOUTTGL = 1 << pin;
00727 }

00737 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t GPIO_PortInGet(GPIO_Port_TypeDef port)
00738 {
00739   EFM_ASSERT(GPIO_PORT_VALID(port));
00740 
00741   return GPIO->P[port].DIN;
00742 }

00745 /***************************************************************************/
00760 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_PortOutClear(GPIO_Port_TypeDef port, uint32_t pins)
00761 {
00762   EFM_ASSERT(GPIO_PORT_VALID(port));
00763 #if defined( _GPIO_P_DOUTCLR_MASK )
00764   GPIO->P[port].DOUTCLR = pins;
00765 #else
00766   BUS_RegMaskedClear(&GPIO->P[port].DOUT, pins);
00767 #endif
00768 }
00769

00771 /***************************************************************************/
00781 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t GPIO_PortOutGet(GPIO_Port_TypeDef port)
00782 {
00783   EFM_ASSERT(GPIO_PORT_VALID(port));
00784 
00785   return GPIO->P[port].DOUT;
00786 }

00789 /***************************************************************************/
00804 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_PortOutSet(GPIO_Port_TypeDef port, uint32_t pins)
00805 {
00806   EFM_ASSERT(GPIO_PORT_VALID(port));
00807 #if defined( _GPIO_P_DOUTSET_MASK )
00808   GPIO->P[port].DOUTSET = pins;
00809 #else
00810   BUS_RegMaskedSet(&GPIO->P[port].DOUT, pins);
00811 #endif
00812 }

00815 /***************************************************************************/
00833 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_PortOutSetVal(GPIO_Port_TypeDef port,
00834                                         uint32_t val,
00835                                         uint32_t mask)
00836 {
00837   EFM_ASSERT(GPIO_PORT_VALID(port));
00838 
00839   GPIO->P[port].DOUT = (GPIO->P[port].DOUT & ~mask) | (val & mask);
00840 }

00858 __STATIC_INLINE void GPIO_PortOutToggle(GPIO_Port_TypeDef port, uint32_t pins)
00859 {
00860   EFM_ASSERT(GPIO_PORT_VALID(port));
00861 
00862   GPIO->P[port].DOUTTGL = pins;
00863 }

00871 {
00872   GPIO->LOCK = GPIO_LOCK_LOCKKEY_UNLOCK;
00873 }
